description.english: Don't open the smoking channel before playing the game.
description.german: Öffne die Zigarettenschachtel nicht, bevor du das Spiel gespielt hast.
description.french: Ne pas ouvrir pas le canal de fumée avant de jouer au jeu.
description.koreana: 게임 놀기 전에 담배 통도를 열지 않다
description.schinese: 玩游戏前不开启香烟通道
description.tchinese: 玩遊戲前不開啟香煙通道
description.japanese: ゲームをプレイする前に喫煙通路を開かない事
description.token: Don't open the smoking channel before playing the game.

description.english: Lift the weights continuously until the clock is filled with the orange liquid.E
description.german: Hebe die Hanteln so lange an, bis die Uhr mit der orangen Flüsskeit gefüllt ist.
description.french: Soulever l'altère sans discontinuer jusqu'à ce que l'horloge soit remplie de liquide orange.
description.koreana: 시계가 오렌지 액체로 채울때까지 연속적으로 아령을 든다
description.schinese: 连续举哑铃直到时钟充满橙色液体
description.tchinese: 連續舉啞鈴直到時鐘充滿橙色液體
description.japanese: 時計をオレンジの液体に満たすまでダンベルを上げ続ける事
description.token: Lift the weights continuously until the clock is filled with the orange liquid.

description.english: Leave the TRANSFER game in Prologue using the quitting channel.
description.german: Verlasse das Spiel TRANSFER im Prolog durch den Ausgang.
description.french: Quitter le jeu TRANSFER durant le Prologue en utilisant le canal d'abandon.
description.koreana: 서론 전송 관문의 포기 통도에서 게임을 떠난다
description.schinese: 从序章传送关卡的放弃通道离开游戏
description.tchinese: 從序章傳送關卡的放棄通道離開遊戲
description.japanese: プロローグにあるポーターのギブアップ通路でゲームからログアウトする事
description.token: Leave the Portal game in Prologue using the quitting channel.

description.english: Save the heart square when playing TRANSFER in Prologue.
description.german: Rette den Begleiterkubus beim Spielen von TRANSFER im Prolog.
description.french: Sauver le cube à cœur en jouant à TRANSFER durant le Prologue.
description.koreana: 서론 전송 게임중에 사랑 상자를 구한다
description.schinese: 在序章传送游戏中拯救爱心方块
description.tchinese: 在序章傳送遊戲中拯救愛心方塊
description.japanese: プロローグにあるポーターゲームの中からハートキューブを救う事
description.token: Save the heart square when playing Portal in Prologue.

description.english: Complete the first level of TRANSFER.
description.german: Schließe den er sten Level von TRANSFER ab.
description.french: Terminer le premier niveau de TRANSFER.
description.schinese: 通关序章传送关卡
description.tchinese: 過關序章傳送關卡
description.japanese: プロローグにあるポーターゲームをクリアする事
description.token: Complete the first level of Portal.

description.english: Insert the flower to the vase.
description.german: Stecke die Blume in die Vase.
description.french: Mettez la fleur dans le vase.
description.schinese: 将花插入花瓶中
description.tchinese: 將花插入花瓶中
description.japanese: 花を花瓶に入れる事
description.token: Insert the flower to the vase.

description.english: The car completely is filled with pink color.
description.german: Das Auto wird komplett in Pink gehüllt.
description.french: Remplir complètement la voiture avec du rose.
description.koreana: 자동차는 분홍색 액체로 가득 차 있었다
description.schinese: 小汽车被粉红色液体填满
description.tchinese: 小汽車被粉紅色液體填滿
description.japanese: トイカーがピンクの液体に満たれる事
description.token: The car completely is filled with pink color.

description.english: Obtain an I block in Tetris on GameJoy.
description.german: Erhalte einen I Stein bei Tetris am GameJoy.
description.french: Obtenir une barre en jouant à Blocks sur la GameJoy.
description.schinese: GameJoy中获得俄罗斯方块长条
description.tchinese: GAMEJOY中獲得長條的俄羅斯方塊
description.japanese: GAMEJOYでI-テトリミノをゲットする事
description.token: Obtain an I block in Tetris on GameJoy.

displayName.japanese: ゲーセンでのインチキ

description.english: Cheat in the arcade to get additional scores.
description.german: Betrüge am Spielautomaten um einen höheren Highscore zu schaffen.
description.french: Tricher aux bornes d'arcade pour gagner des points supplémentaires.
description.koreana: 게임방에서 부정 행위를 통해 부가 포인트를 얻다
description.schinese: 在街机厅使用作弊方法获得额外的点数
description.tchinese: 在遊戲廳使用作弊方法獲得額外的點數
description.japanese: ゲーセンでインチキな方法を使いボーナスポイントをゲットする事
description.token: Cheat in the arcade to get additional scores.

description.english: Prevent the teacher's bicycle from arriving the arcade.
description.german: Verhindere, dass das vom Lehrer in der Spielhalle ankommt.
description.french: Empêcher le vélo du professeur d'arriver au local d'arcade.
description.koreana: 담임 선생님의 자전거가 게임방으로 가는 것을 막다
description.schinese: 阻止班主任的自行车到达街机厅
description.tchinese: 阻止班導的腳踏車到達遊戲廳
description.japanese: 担任先生の自転車をゲーセンに着くのを阻止する事
description.token: Prevent the teacher's bicycle from arriving the arcade.

description.english: The dinosaur eats the goldfish.
description.german: Der Dinosaurier frisst den Goldfisch.
description.french: Le dinosaure mange le poisson rouge.
description.schinese: 恐龙吃到小金鱼
description.tchinese: 恐龍吃到小金魚
description.japanese: 恐竜が金魚を食べる事

description.english: Complete Episode I without copying homework.
description.german: Schließe Epsiode 1 ab, ohne Hausaufgaben abzuschreiben.
description.french: Terminer l'Épisode 1 sans copier les devoirs.
description.schinese: 第一章不抄同学的作业
description.tchinese: 第一章不抄同學的作業
description.japanese: チャプター1では同級生の宿題をコピーしない事
description.token: Complete Episode I without copying homework.

description.english: Save the little goldfish from being eaten and help it reach the GameJoy.
description.german: Bewahre den Goldfisch davor gefressen zu werden und erreiche mit ihm den GameJoy.
description.french: Empêcher le petit poisson rouge de se faire manger et l'aider à atteindre le GameJoy.
description.koreana: 먹게되는 운명을 탈출하는 작은 금붕어를 도움말 및 도달GAMEJOY
description.schinese: 帮助小金鱼逃脱被吃掉的命运并到达GAMEJOY
description.tchinese: 幫助小金魚逃脫被吃掉的命運並且到達GAMEJOY
description.japanese: 食べられる運命から金魚を取り逃がして、GAMEJOYまで辿り着く事
description.token: Save the little goldfish from being eaten and help it reach the GameJoy.

description.english: Collect 3 diaries in Episode I.
description.german: Sammle alle 3 Tagebücher in der ersten Episode.
description.french: Ramasser 3 journaux intimes dans l'Épisode 1.
description.schinese: 收集第一章3篇日记
description.tchinese: 收集第一章3篇日記
description.japanese: チャプター1の日記をトータル3通を集める事

description.english: The Farmercom is completely filled with golden liquid.
description.german: Der Farmercom ist komplett mit goldener Farbe gefüllt.
description.french: Remplir complètement le Farmercom avec du liguide doré.
description.schinese: Farmercom游戏机里灌满金色液体
description.tchinese: Farmercom遊戲機裡灌滿金色液體
description.japanese: Farmercomゲーム機が金色の液体に満たれる事
description.token: The Farmercom is completely filled with golden liquid.

description.english: Complete all Farmercom games in hard mode.
description.german: Schließe alle Farmercom Spiele im schweren Modus ab.
description.french: Terminer tous les jeux Farmercom en mode difficile.
description.schinese: Farmercom所有游戏困难模式通关
description.tchinese: Farmercom所有遊戲通關難度模式

description.english: Fill the alley with fruit juice.
description.german: Fülle den Weg mit Fruchtsaft.
description.french: Remplir l'allée de jus de fruit.
description.koreana: 골목에서 다양한 색상으로 과일 주스를 덮여하자
description.schinese: 让小巷铺满各种颜色的果汁
description.tchinese: 讓小巷鋪滿各種顏色的果汁
description.japanese: いろんなカラーの果汁を路地に満ちあふれる事

description.german: Sammel alle Tagebücher von Episode

description.schinese: 收集第二章所有日记
description.tchinese: 收集第二章所有日記
description.japanese: 第二章の日記を全て集める事

description.english: Cover the manhole.

description.schinese: 盖上井盖
description.tchinese: 蓋上水溝蓋

description.english: Score 100 points on the exam.

description.schinese: 考试拿到100分
description.tchinese: 考試拿到100分

description.schinese: 完成偷井盖
description.tchinese: 完成偷水溝蓋

description.english: Collect all the weapons.
description.german: Sammle alle Waffen.

description.schinese: 收集所有武器
description.tchinese: 收集所有武器

description.english: Defeat the bullies in Downtown Fighter.
description.german: Besiege die Schläger in Downtown Fighter.
description.french: Battez les caïds dans Downtown Fighter.
description.koreana: Downtown Fighter 에서 막내 동생들을 타도한다.

description.tchinese: 在Downtown Fighter 中打倒一大群小弟

description.german: Lass die Reagensgläschen in der richtigen Reihenfolge ertönen.
description.french: Accorder les tubes à essai jusqu'à obtenir la bonne note.

description.tchinese: 在灌水的試管上敲擊出正確的音樂
description.japanese: 水が注い混んだ試験管を使ってメロディーを正確に打ち出す事

description.english: Find the mastermind's path home.
description.german: Finde den Heimweg des bösen Genies.
description.french: Trouver le chemin vers la maison du cerveau de la bande.
